Generation VI.X: Trimming its fluffy fur not only makes it more elegant but also increases the swiftness of its movements.
Generation VI.Y: Historically, in the Kalos region, these Pokémon were the designated guardians of the king.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Trimming its fluffy fur not only makes it more elegant but also increases the swiftness of its movements.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Historically, in the Kalos region, these Pokémon were the designated guardians of the king.

Generation VII.Ultra Sun: There was an era when aristocrats would compete to see who could trim their Furfrou's fur into the most exquisite style.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Left alone, its fur will grow longer and longer, but it will only allow someone it trusts to cut it.
